resources.string:
In this task, you will see a series of faces one at a time. Touch the screen when you see 
 a certain kind of facial expression, but to Not touch at other times. 

 Touch the screen to start

Across the task, the rules on what facial expression or emotion to respond to will change,
 and an instruction screen will tell you the new rules.

 Touch the screen to see the first instruction and start a pratice session.

Touch the screen whenever you see the SURPRISED faces. Do not press for other faces, only the SURPRISED faces. 

 Remember to go as fast as you can without making any mistakes. 


Touch the screen to start.
Get Ready \n\n Touch the screen when you are ready.
The test is about to start \n Touch the screen to start.
Thank You!! \n\n Touch the screen to exit.
